info.description: A comprehensive API for managing real estate properties in Kenya
info.title: Kenyan Real Estate API

get.description: Get all available property amenities, optionally filtered by category
Get a list of all counties in Kenya
Get detailed information about a specific county
Get all sub-counties within a specific county

post.description: Format an amount in Kenyan Shillings (KES)
Authenticate user with email and password

get.description: Get all properties owned by the authenticated landlord
Get popular residential areas, optionally filtered by county
Get the profile of the currently authenticated user

put.description: Update the profile information of the currently authenticated user

get.description: Get a list of available properties with optional filtering and pagination

post.description: Create a new property listing (landlord only)

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific property including images

403.description: You can only update your own properties
You can only delete your own properties

post.description: Add an image to a property (landlord only)

403.description: You can only add images to your own properties

delete.description: Delete an image from a property (landlord only)

403.description: You can only delete images from your own properties

get.description: Get all available property types with their descriptions

post.description: Refresh an expired JWT token to get a new one
Create a new user account with email, password, and profile information

get.description: Get common rental terms used in Kenya

post.description: Send a verification email to the authenticated user

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific sub-county
Get default utilities information for properties

post.description: Validate a Kenyan phone number format

get.description: Get the email verification status for the authenticated user

post.description: Verify email address using the verification token

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
Bearer.name: Authorization
